name: Bunny Kitty Kitty
description:
Bunny and Kitty have gone to a Pastry shop to have some Lunch, but Kitty is a glutton and wants to drink all the Milkshake, and doesn't want Bunny to eat much. But Bunny is tired of Kitty and doesn't want her to drink too much Milkshake as she gets gas later on. Objectives:Bunny only eats Pancakes and Kitty only drinks Milkshake
Make sure Kitty don't drink more than double of Bunny's Pancakes
Make sure Bunny doesn't eat more than Kitty.

Controls:
Mouse click on Bunny or Kitty to feed them or to hold a Food item
Press R to restart the game.

Game made for Trijam #75
Theme: 1 for Me, 2 for You

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Sprites: 49 minutes
Programming: 1 Hour 32 minutes
Bug Fixing: 26  + 10 minutes (Last 10 minutes because the game was not responding to mouse click)

Total Time: 2 hours 57 Minutes (a few bugs still remain..)

Sprites made by me

NOTE: The windows executable is the full game, which is bug free and has audio. For fairness, I won't be uploading the HTML version of it until the end of the jam.
